alert.note: Alert for Glenn (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 08 at 5:06PM PDT until June 08 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Small Stream Flood Advisory for Poor Drainage Areas for... Northwestern Colusa County in central California... Southwestern Tehama County in northern California... Western Glenn County in central California... * Until 800 PM PDT. * At 506 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will result in minor flooding in the advisory area. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Alder Springs and Saddle Camp.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move away from recently burned areas. Life threatening flooding of creeks, roads and normally dry arroyos is likely. The heavy rains will likely trigger rockslides, mudslides and debris flows in steep terrain, especially in and around these areas.
